title: Interactive Exercise
description:
Practice TDD by creating a Password Validator:
1. Write tests for password requirements:
   - Min 8 characters
   - At least one uppercase letter
   - At least one number
   - At least one special character
2. Implement the validator to pass all tests
3. Use pytest parametrize for multiple test cases

hints.text: Start with simple tests. Use regex for character checks. Return helpful error messages.
